tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Actually we know madam more than 2 years, for my both baby my wife getting consulation from Madam only.She is more friendly, calm, clear in explanation, easy to reach, even she is busy she call us and give the solutions.
Recently my second baby delivered on 21/11/2021 , due to first child birth operation in CMC hospital,this baby also delivered with LSCS operation.
Only for her only we admited promed hospital in chennai.
As a result we got a boy baby gift eventhough operation we are not worry because of Dhivyambigai madam ,also The Promed hospital take care very well got good service and care from all the staff nurses and other staff's.
Now both baby and Mother good.
All this because of Dhivyambigai Madam only.We are not forgot your care and help.

She is very kind, helpful, positive energy to the patient, she will hear your problems by not making any hurry in catching up the next patient . She will not prescribe unnecessary medicines. We went to her consultation after seeing so many doctors, ******* *** **** ** *** **** **** *** ********** Give you and your problem to her,  just trust and follow her instructions . * **** *** ** **** **** *******  99% punctual in her timings. As always Thank you very much for the help!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is truly an angel sent from above for our family. When I was very adament for c-section it was only because of her I had a normal delivery. She is both professionally talented and personally so friendly. I would definitely recommend her to everyone. She is a doctor whom you can totally trust upon.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is a very approachable person. She listens to all your problems and concerns. We have been consulting her for my entire gestation and even in this pandemic situation she has been very supportive throughout. She was reachable at any time in case of any emergency and helped with the queries. She boosted me up for delivery and helped me for quick recovery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She was extremely professional and at the same time, empathetic to the patient at all the appointments. She listens to all your doubts and clarifies them patiently. I have so much faith in her that I have referred several of my friends to Ma'am for sound treatment.I am extremely happy with the way she treats the patients, and would definitely recommend her to anyone who wants the best medical care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: She is the first Doctor I have ever had that concentrated on wellness of the mind, body, and soul.  Most important is she will listen to your problems and approach a proper solution which I don't see in many. I had very tough time and stressed more about infertility issues. Just because of her proper diagnosis, positive vibes I am proud mom of my Princess ‚ù§Ô∏è. Thank you so much Divya Mam ‚ù§Ô∏è

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is  a very caring, friendly and approachable person. Listens to the problem fully and gives simple and apt solutions detailing the pros and cons of it. Can discuss any type of queries with her and we would be assured to get a satisfying answer. Very humble person and would definitely recommend to everyone

During my wife pregnancy, Dr. Dhivyambigai, gave very much caring,smiling,treatment and excellent hospitality during those atmosphere.And i thank for a great dedicated service given by Dr.Dhivyambigai
Thank you for taking such good care of my wife during pregnancy.Also thank you again for doing a great job and excellent treatment for us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: i admitted my wife in promed hospital for heavy menstrual bleeding issue...there she is an OG specialist...we easily approched  her without any delay...the way she listens our story and rectify our issues with atmost patiency was unbeatable...she clearly explained everything without even using a single scary words...from the day of admission to surgeey day to till now everything goes well..my wife is completely alright now....definitely i would suggest her for my daughter too.... completely satisfied by her service....thank you so much for your service and your caring words
*** ***** ** * **** ***** She will be more friendly and always speaks positively. I am consulting her for my pregnancy. Will recommend her to all who are all searching for a good gyno.

Dr Dhivya is very caring and explains all the problems in details without causing any panic.
I had consulted her for my functional ovarian cyst and she guided me patiently until i fully recovered from it.
I would recommend her to everyone:)

I am satisfied with doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Divyambikai is very patient and kind in explaining any medical scenario we are going through. She is very clear, spontaneous and confident in her diagnoses and treatment measures. It has always been a comfortable experience to consult her every time I needed to.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: l have consulted Dr Dhivyambigai for my pregnancy an year ago. she is very active and very kind, the way she treated me was awesome. when i was  preparing myself to give a birth she has been very supportive and thrown a lots of positive vibes around me  and  finally i was blessed with baby girl.  From my heart i highly recommend Dr Dhivyambigai who took care for my whole pregnancy life time. Thanks a lot Dr Dhivya.
